data.name: The Silent Islands
data.detailed_description:
On a dark and stormy night, your boat crashes on a strange Island in the Bermuda Triangle.
Stranded, you soon discover this is no ordinary Island.

It's controlled by a General who, in his secret lab, creating a special virus, named “Inferno” and testing it on his unworthy humans.

His goal is to finally get his formula right to reduce the population on Earth.

In order to escape the Island, you must find essential items and fight your way to the General.

Can you survive the night on The Silent Islands ?


Features:
• A fascinating story.
• Original story
• Unique Horror-survival elements

data.short_description: THE SILENT ISLANDS, is a survival, horror game where you'll need to find essential items and fight your way to the General to put an end to the nightmare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
